p:
The doses of CPT used as described by the different studies is varied. A Chinese pilot study showed a minimal use of a single dose of 200 mL convalescent plasma with neutralizing antibody titers >1:640. Another study by Bin Zhang et al
8 reported a maximum of 2400 mL of convalescent plasma administered to a 73 years old male patient. Due to variability of CPT doses in reports, the optimal dose of CPT for COVID‐19 could not be determined. All 27 survivors received CPT between Day 6 and Day 50 after the onset of symptoms or admission to hospitals.
